document.full_text: golf's governing bodies, the united states golf association (usga) and royal & ancient (r&a), have amended the rulebook following high-profile incidents involving padraig harrington and camilo villegas.
document.title: golf's ruling bodies amend incorrect scorecard decision
lines_and_colors: golf's governing bodies, the united states golf association (usga) and royal & ancient (r&a), have amended the rulebook following high-profile incidents involving padraig harrington and camilo villegas.
